item.description:
The best deal of the year is about to happen...a 3 course dinner (salad, entree and dessert) for $20.11 for the annual TASTE OF HARTFORD at Hartford's premiere Italian restaurant...Carbone's! 

 

Carbone's has been serving authentic Italian cuisine since 1938. One family and three generations has established Carbone's as the premier Italian dining experience in all of Connecticut. Consistently voted Hartford's Best Italian Restaurant, Carbone's offers elegant gourmet cuisine served with Old World Hospitality. We have reserved our table today and we invite you to come see why they are the best...What's Special is You!

 

Now this is very important...please read and heed: Chuck and I have had to pay a pricey deposit to ensure our numbers. If you RSVP yes, please, please do so responsibly. You will be expected to SHOW UP otherwise we will forfeit our deposit! Also, we have set a maximum limit of 15 people for this event. Once that number is met, we will NOT be able to procure additional space. So please RSVP early to reserve your spot. In addition, for this event only, we are asking that members limit the amount of guests they can bring to one.

 

BTW...we will have our own private dining room. Hope to see you there...Salute!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Terri or Chuck's Table....cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Elegant Dining for the Taste of Hartford...CARBONE'S!
